title: Combination of silicene and boronene as a potential anode material for high-performance lithium-ion batteries: Insights from first principles
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Hai-lin Ren, Yang Su, Shuai Zhao, Cheng-wei Li, Xiao-min Wang, Bo-han Li, Bo-wen Zhang
